name: pp-up
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases a selected move’s max PP by 20% its original max PP, to a maximum of 1.6×. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 20%.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Raises the maximum PP of a selected move.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the maximum PP of a selected move.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Slightly raises the maximum PP of a selected move for one POKéMON.
